lead_paragraph: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp wants his players to be "angry" and guard against complacency when they entertain promoted Hull City on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Klopp Wants Anger to Drive Liverpool Against Hull
headline.main: Klopp Wants Anger to Drive Liverpool Against Hull

snippet: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp wants his players to be "angry" and guard against complacency when they entertain promoted Hull City on Saturday....
